a.title:
Board of Education Meeting. Monday, April 20 @ 6:30 PM in the DCS Auditorium. Social Distancing will be enforced.
Location: DCS Auditorium Starting at: 6:30 PM

div.p: Board of Education Meeting. Monday, April 20 @ 6:30 PM in the DCS Auditorium. Social Distancing will be enforced.

a.title:
Thursday, April 23rd at 2pm. DCS has scheduled a virtual assembly/interactive zoom presentation for 7-12th grade. Zoom link will be sent directly to participating grades.Youth Mover, Brandon Lee White, delivers a high-energy, entertaining, and effective anti-bullying and character education program for youth across the country. As a professional ballroom dance instructor and motivational youth speaker, Brandon incorporates "teamwork, courage, character, self-discipline, exercise, and anti-bullying" into his leadership school assemblies and workshops. Brandon's full-package motivational presentation will make your students laugh, think, and grow!
Location: AT YOUR HOME - ZOOM Starting at: 2:00 PM

div.p: Thursday, April 23rd at 2pm. DCS has scheduled a virtual assembly/interactive zoom presentation for 7-12th grade. Zoom link will be sent directly to participating grades.

Youth Mover, Brandon Lee White, delivers a high-energy, entertaining, and effective anti-bullying and character education program for youth across the country. As a professional ballroom dance instructor and motivational youth speaker, Brandon incorporates "teamwork, courage, character, self-discipline, exercise, and anti-bullying" into his leadership school assemblies and workshops. Brandon's full-package motivational presentation will make your students laugh, think, and grow!

a.title: STEM Club members will be selling Gertrude Hawk and Hershey Candy Bars.  See any member for sales or Mrs. Melissa Frisbee, or Mrs. Sandy Shaver.
